snippet: McDaniels became the most reviled and, it turns out, unexpectedly influential figure in Denver after stunning the N.F.L. by selecting Tim Tebow at least a full round ahead of popular expectation.
abstract: Analysis notes that New England Patriots have announced the rehiring of assistant coach Josh McDaniels, one-time Denver Broncos coach who helped assemble Denver team, including quarterback Tim Tebow, that New England is poised to face in AFC divisional playoff game.
lead_paragraph: McDaniels became the most reviled and, it turns out, unexpectedly influential figure in Denver after stunning the N.F.L. by selecting Tim Tebow at least a full round ahead of popular expectation.

headline.seo: Josh McDaniels, Key Figure for the Broncos, Now a Patriot
headline.main: Josh McDaniels, Key Figure for the Broncos, Is Now a Patriot
headline.print_headline: Scorned, but Key Figure In Rise of the Broncos
